Best Leggings for Women for Yoga:

Best Plus-Size Leggings for Women for Working Out:

Best Leggings for Women for Working Out:

Best Leggings for Women On Amazon:

Best Leggings for Plus-Size Women Overall:

Best Leggings for Women Overall:

Whether you’re searching for the best running leggings or need some yoga pants that are durable for all-day wear, the perfect pair for you is out there. To find them, we tested dozens of leggings from brands like Lululemon, Alo, Gymshark, Vuori, and Nike. Our testers wore these running, lifting, squatting, walking, lounging, shopping, brunching and beyond. Here are our honest reviews.

But with so many options, it can be overwhelming to know where to start. “When choosing leggings, it’s essential to consider their purpose,” explains Nofar Hagag , founder of Nofar Method. For example, she notes that high-impact activities should have performance features like moisture-wicking fabrics, compression for support, and a secure fit. On the other hand, she suggests the best leggings for women should prioritize soft, stretchy materials, versatile styles, and comfort. Georgia Wood Murphy , founder of Tera Studios, adds that you should be looking for breathable materials to wear while working out.

The best leggings are more than just a wardrobe staple — they’re an essential part of your routine. Just like finding a pair of comfy sneakers , picking out leggings that can take you from casual lounging at home to feeling secure while working out to your favorite fitness app class is crucial. The right pair can make all the difference in how you move and feel.

Best Leggings for Women Overall Lululemon Fast and Free High-Rise Tight Credit: lululemon View on Lululemon Why We Like It Lightweight, sweat-wicking fabric

High-rise waistband for support

Convenient pockets for essentials It's Worth Noting Sizes often sell out quick Colors: 5 | Sizes: 0-20 | Materials: Nylon, Lycra elastane | Hem Length: 23”, 25”, 28” Our top pick for the best overall are these Lululemon leggings with pockets designed for both HIIT workouts and everyday wear. Crafted from lightweight, sweat-wicking fabric, they offer a comfortable fit that moves with you. The high-rise waistband provides support and coverage, while the multiple inseams make for a comfortable fit for various heights. Additionally, the two side drop-in pockets and three drop-in pockets on the waistband allow you to carry all of your essentials hands-free. “Let's just say this: I'm often sent running leggings for stories I'm working on, yet I still went and bought my own pair of these earlier this year to replace my old ones because they're *that good*,” says our tester. “If I'm running a marathon in leggings weather, these are what I'll wear, no question.” Lululemon Fast and Free High-Rise Tight comes in five colors and is made from Lycra and nylon. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Fast and Free High-Rise Tight has five total drop-in pockets, 2 side and 3 waistband. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Fast and Free High-Rise Tight has convenient pockets for essentials. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Fast and Free High-Rise Tight has a high-rise waistband for comfort and support. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Fast and Free High-Rise Tight has multiple inseam options for comfort at different heights. Credit: Shape

Credit: Shape











Best Leggings for Plus-Size Women Overall Beyond Yoga Midi High Waisted Legging Credit: Amazon $97 $68 at Amazon $97 at Zappos $97 at Nordstrom Why We Like It Soft, four-way stretch fabric

High waistband for secure fit

Inclusive sizing range It's Worth Noting Midi length might be too short for tall people

May not provide as much compression as some prefer Colors: 18 | Sizes: 1X-4X | Materials: Polyester, elastane | Hem Length: 24” Designed to provide luxurious comfort and noticeable support for sizes up to 4X, these leggings are made from a soft, four-way stretch fabric that runs from your ankles to your waist. The high waistband is nonslip, making it suitable for workouts and casual wear to boot. “These leggings have my ideal fit,” our tester noted. “They are true to size, with no digging whatsoever, and have medium support. The fit is sculpted to the body so I feel well supported and put together with subtle compression.”

Beyond Yoga High Waisted Legging has an inclusive size range and supportive waistband. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga High Waisted Legging has soft four-way stretch fabric and a high waistband for support. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga High Waisted Legging provides less compression than competitors. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga High Waisted Legging has a high waist that is non-slip for your security and comfort. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga High Waisted Legging is made from stretchy fabric that feels sculpted to the body. Credit: Shape









Best Versatile Leggings for Women Brooks High Point Tight Credit: Brooks View on Brooksrunning.com Why We Like It Moisture-wicking fabric

Adjustable internal drawcord

Pockets included for item storage

Minimized chafing It's Worth Noting Size up

May be too lightweight for chilly weather Colors: 3 | Sizes: XS-2X | Materials: Recycled polyester, spandex | Hem Length: n/a Engineered with active women in mind, these are a pair of reliable leggings you can count on for various activities. “These are some of the most comfortable leggings, both while chilling and running,” says our tester. “The comfort factor while sitting doesn't take away from the support I get while running.” Constructed with moisture-wicking fabric, these tights keep you dry during workouts. Additionally, the snug fit offers muscle support that helps you move better, while the smooth, soft fabric keeps you feeling good, too.

The Brooks Women's High Point Tight has wind- and water-resistant panels. Credit: Shape

The Brooks Women's High Point Tight has flexible fabric at the hips and knees. Credit: Shape

The Brooks Women's High Point Tight has water-resistant panels yet the fabric is breathable. Credit: Shape

The Brooks Women's High Point Tight has water resistant panels and a drawstring to keep them tight. Credit: Shape

A bright pink drawstring helps keep the Brooks Women's High Point Tight as snug as you need it. Credit: Shape

The Brooks Women's High Point Tight has four roomy pockets to stash what you need for long runs. Credit: Shape











Best Running Leggings for Women Janji W's 7/8 Pace Tight Credit: Janji View on Janji.com View on REI Why We Like It Durable stretch

Reflective elements for safety

7/8 length for mobility

Super soft material

Lots of storage It's Worth Noting Limited color choices

May run small in sizing

Not the most compressive option Colors: 1 | Sizes: XS-2X | Materials: Nylon, spandex | Hem Length: 25” Runners who need leggings that keep up with their active routines, prepare to make these Janji tights your new go-to. With a high-performance fabric blend, these leggings wick moisture away, keeping you dry and comfortable during even the toughest runs. “They offer nice, gentle compression without feeling squeezed like sausage meat,” notes our tester. “They stay in place without rolling down and have a drawstring if you need to adjust the fit, though I just left it loose.” Moreover, the 7/8 length hits at just the right spot for ankle mobility, making them ideal for fast movement. Featuring subtle reflective details, these leggings ensure you're visible in low-light conditions.

Janji W's 7/8 Pace Tights have big thigh pockets that have room for a phone and multiple gels. Credit: Shape

Janji W's 7/8 Pace Tights have convenient pockets that are deep yet barely visible. Credit: Shape

Janji W's 7/8 Pace Tights feature a small inner pocket at the back of the waist. Credit: Shape

Janji W's 7/8 Pace Tight has a waistband that contours to the hips and small reflective details. Credit: Shape

Janji W's 7/8 Pace Tights are compressive for fast runs and offer ample pocket space. Credit: Shape









Best Leggings for Women On Amazon THE GYM PEOPLE Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants Credit: Amazon $27 $19 at Amazon View on Thegympeople.com Why We Like It Thick, supportive waistband

Convenient side pockets

Stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric

Affordable price

Multiple color options It's Worth Noting Thicker material may not be ideal for warm weather

May feel tight around the waistband for some Colors: 24 | Sizes: XS-4X | Materials: Polyamide, spandex | Hem Length: 26”, 26.4”, 26.8” These affordable and functional leggings from The Gym People offer a thick waistband and high-rise fit, giving you support during any workout. With practical side pockets, you can easily store essentials like your phone or keys while working out or running errands. “I would recommend this product to anyone who likes slightly more support around the waist or just needs to add a couple of extra leggings to their workout rotation,” says our tester, adding that they are “thick and slightly compressive.” As mentioned, the stretchy fabric provides true comfort, while the moisture-wicking properties keep you dry throughout the day.

The Gym People Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants with Pockets have a thick and supportive waistband. Credit: Shape

The Gym People Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants are made with moisture-wicking fabric. Credit: Shape

The Gym People Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants have convenient side drop-in pockets. Credit: Shape

The Gym People Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants with Pockets provide support for a secure fit. Credit: Shape

The Gym People Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants with Pockets offers support around the waistband. Credit: Shape

The Gym People Thick High-Waisted Yoga Pants with Pockets come in multiple color options. Credit: Shape











Best Leggings for Women for Working Out lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight 25" Credit: Lululemon View on Lululemon Why We Like It Breathable, moisture-wicking Everlux fabric

High-rise waistband for added support

Adjustable drawcord

Four-way stretch

Pockets included It's Worth Noting Higher price point Colors: 14 | Sizes: 0-20 | Materials: Nylon, Lycra elastane | Hem Length: 23”, 25”, 28”, 31” When you’re tackling high-intensity workouts, you need leggings that give out, and these Lululemon tights were made for the job. Using the brand’s signature Everlux fabric, these leggings are breathable and moisture-wicking, keeping you cool no matter how intense your sweat session gets. As our tester noted, “These pants really stand up to sweat! They move the perspiration off your body without becoming heavy and uncomfortable.” They added that “you can move freely in them,” and described them as being airy and breathable. These are the leggings you’ll reach for day after day when you need performance and comfort.

lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight 25" has a high-rise waistband for added support. Credit: Shape

lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight 25" is made from lycra and nylon that is breathable. Credit: Shape

lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight is made from the brand's stretchy, signature Everlux fabric. Credit: Shape

lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight is made from four-way stretch fabric. Credit: Shape

lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight 25" has a comfortable adjustable drawcord. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Wunder Train High Rise Tight is sweat-wicking and feels lightweight on the body. Credit: Shape











Best Plus-Size Leggings for Women for Working Out Athleta High Rise 7/8 Legging Credit: Athleta View on Athleta Why We Like It Soft, stretchy fabric

High-rise waistband for secure fit

Built-in side pocket for essentials It's Worth Noting Not the most compressive legging

Limited color selection

Not smoothing, according to our tester Colors: 23 | Sizes: XXS-3X (regular), XS-XL (tall), XXS-XL (petite) | Materials: Nylon, elastane | Hem Length: 25’’, 23’’, 28’’ Made to move with you, these leggings are a game-changer for plus-size women looking for comfort during workouts. The fabric feels soft against the skin and offers just the right amount of stretch, providing a supportive fit. “The waistband provided a moderate amount of hold and compression, but it was very comfortable, both while lounging and while working out,” notes our tester. “I felt an ease of use with these and didn't feel restricted in my movements.” They also shared that they found there to be no chafing, even with extended wear.

The Athleta Salutation Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging moves with you when running or stretching. Credit: Shape

The fabric of the Athleta Salutation Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging is stretchy in every direction. Credit: Shape

Athleta Salutation Stash High Rise 7/8 Leggings have deep pockets on the sides. Credit: Shape

The Athleta Salutation Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging conceals pantylines and there's no chafing. Credit: Shape

The snug waistband of the Athleta Salutation Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging stays put through poses. Credit: Shape

The Athleta Salutation Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging is very stretchy with a wide waistband. Credit: Shape











Best Leggings for Women for Yoga Athleta Interval Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging Credit: Athleta View on Athleta Why We Like It Soft, stretchy fabric

High-rise waist for added support

Included pocket for essentials It's Worth Noting Not as compressive as some other leggings

Not ideal for high-intensity workouts Colors: 23 | Sizes: XXS-3X (regular), XS-XL (tall), XXS-XL (petite) | Materials: Nylon, elastane | Hem Length: 25’’, 23’’, 28’’ A must-have for your yoga practice, these leggings offer a stretchy, supportive fit that allows for deep stretches and fluid movement. These are designed to feel like a second skin, keeping you comfortable from sun salutations to savasana. The high-rise waistband keeps everything in place during your practice and has a side pocket for your essentials. “I would recommend this product to people who practice yoga or anyone who wants to feel comfortable while doing a lot of movement,” says our tester, adding that these are their new “go-to” yoga pants.

Athleta Interval Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging has a supportive fit with moderate compression. Credit: Shape

Athleta Interval Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging has built-in side pockets for convenience. Credit: Shape

Athleta Interval Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging is made from nylon and comes in three inseam lengths. Credit: Shape

Athleta Interval Stash High Rise 7/8 Legging is made from soft, stretchy fabric. Credit: Shape







Best Leggings for Short Women Under Armour Women's Leggings Credit: Under Armour View on Zappos $45 at Underarmour.com View on Basspro.com Why We Like It Lightweight, breathable fabric

No-slip waistband for a secure fit

Four-way stretch

Made of sweat-wicking material It's Worth Noting Not seamless

May be tight around the waist for some Colors: 5 | Sizes: XSS-XXLS (short), XS-XXL (regular), XST-XXLT (tall) | Materials: Polyester, elastane | Hem Length: 26" Finding the perfect leggings for short women can be tough, but these ankle leggings check all the boxes. The HeatGear fabric is lightweight and breathable, perfect for warmer workouts or layering under cold-weather gear. A no-slip waistband ensures the leggings stay in place, so you won’t have to constantly readjust. “These leggings fit like a glove and are very snug to the skin,” says our tester. “They are true to size and the waistband does not budge while working out. I also liked that the ankles stay put and don’t bunch up.” With an ankle length that hits just right, these leggings offer a clean, nice fit for shorter frames that will move with you every step of the way. The HeatGear No-Slip Waistband Ankle Legging is made from lightweight, breathable polyester. Credit: Shape

The HeatGear No-Slip Waistband Ankle Leggings are made from comfortable sweat-wicking material. Credit: Shape

Under Armour HeatGear No-Slip Waistband Ankle Leggings have a four-way stretch fabric for comfort. Credit: Shape

Under Armour HeatGear No-Slip Waistband Ankle Leggings fit true to size. Credit: Shape









Best Leggings for Tall Women lululemon Wunder Under Yoga Pants High-Rise Credit: lululemon View on Lululemon Why We Like It SmoothCover fabric for a soft, second-skin feel

Four-way stretch

High-rise waistband for added support

Sweat-wicking material It's Worth Noting Higher price point

Waistband might be too tight for some Colors: 5 | Sizes: 0-14 | Materials: Nylon, Lycra elastane | Hem Length: 25’’, 28’’ These leggings were made with tall women in mind, offering a longer inseam that ensures a perfect fit. This extended length provides ample coverage without feeling cropped, while the high-rise waistband keeps you supported and comfortable. Plus, these Lululemon leggings deliver a buttery-soft feel and stretch ideal for both activewear and casual outfits. “These are incredibly seamless, soft, and comfortable, and can almost pass as real pants if you want to wear them to the office or out to brunch,” says our tester. “They stay nice and cool throughout any workout, including hot yoga, and have a very high waistband.” Lululemon Wunder Under SmoothCover High-Rise Tight 28" has a soft, second-skin feel. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Wunder Under SmoothCover High-Rise Tight 28" has four-way stretch and is sweat-wicking. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Wunder Under SmoothCover High-Rise Tight has a longer inseam for taller women. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Wunder Under SmoothCover High-Rise Tight is made from SmoothCover for a butter-soft feel. Credit: Shape

Lululemon Wunder Under SmoothCover High-Rise Tight 28" has a seamless and comfortable fit. Credit: Shape













Best Leggings for Women for Everyday Wear Girlfriend Collective High-Rise Legging Credit: Girlfriend Collective View on Amazon View on Girlfriend.com $78 $51 at Backcountry Why We Like It Sustainable, eco-friendly materials

Compressive fabric for a flattering fit

Soft and breathable for all-day comfort It's Worth Noting Sizing can be tricky, might need to size down

Not seamless Colors: 22 | Sizes: XXS-6XL | Materials: Recycled water bottles (RPET), spandex | Hem Length: ​​23 3/4", 28.5" Looking for a pair of leggings that are comfortable enough to wear every day? These Girlfriend Collective compressive leggings are it. Whether you're running errands or lounging at home, they’re breathable and soft, with a design that’s as functional as it is fashionable. Available in an array of colors, these leggings are a wardrobe essential that you’ll find yourself reaching for again and again. “It's one of the higher quality pair of leggings I have in my collection, and I get compliments when I wear them to run errands,” says our tester, further noting that they felt secure during high and low-impact activities. Girlfriend Collective Compressive High-Rise Legging are high-quality and available in 22 colors. Credit: Shape

Girlfriend Collective Compressive High-Rise Legging are made from compression fabric. Credit: Shape

Girlfriend Collective Compressive High-Rise Leggings have a compressive fit for a flattering look. Credit: Shape

Best Leggings for Women with Compression Nike High-Waisted Full-Length Leggings Credit: Nike $120 $67 at Nike View on REI Why We Like It Compression fabric provides firm support

Pockets for phone and small items

Great for high-intensity workouts

Extra wide waistband It's Worth Noting Tight fit, so size up if between sizes

Not as breathable as lighter fabrics

Firm compression might restrict some movement Colors: 3 | Sizes: XXS-3XL, XXS-3XL (tall) | Materials: Recycled nylon | Hem Length: N/A These Nike leggings are the ultimate pick when you need compression to support your body during runs, lifts, hikes, and beyond. They offer a secure fit that won't slip or slide. Plus, the addition of pockets makes them perfect for storing your essentials while you’re on the go. “The leggings take some squeezing to get into, and at first I worried they were too small. But that's just thanks to the firm compression,” says our tester. “The waistband is tight, and there's a drawband if you need to tighten further.” Whether you're running, lifting, or just out for a jog, these leggings provide the stability and performance you need. These Nike leggings are ideal for high-intensity workouts thanks to their high compression. Credit: Shape

These Nike leggings for women offer a secure fit that won't budge during workouts. Credit: Shape

These leggings have a convenient pocket to stow your phone or keys during workouts. Credit: Shape

Nike Go Women's Firm-Support Leggings come in three colors and are made from recycled nylon. Credit: Shape

These leggings have a drawstring in the waistband to further tighten if needed. Credit: Shape

These Nike Go leggings have firm support from compression fabric. Credit: Shape

Nike Go Women's Firm-Support High-Waisted Leggings with Pockets have an extra wide waistband. Credit: Shape













Best Leggings for Women for Winter Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Legging Credit: Beyond Yoga $99 $70 at Amazon $99 $55 at Zappos $99 at Nordstrom Why We Like It Soft and warm fabric

High-waisted for added support and warmth

Versatile midi length

Perfect for winter lounging or casual outings It's Worth Noting Not breathable enough for intense workouts

On the thicker side, which can feel heavy for some Colors: 4 | Sizes: XXS-XL | Materials: Polyester, elastane | Hem Length: 24” Winter leggings are a must-have for cold-weather workouts. These Beyond Yoga leggings are a cozy choice for days when you want to stay in bed but can't because, you know, you have responsibilities. The high-waisted design ensures extra warmth and support so you'll feel like you're wearing cozy jammies but look like a functioning adult. For your winter wardrobe, they’ll pair nicely with boots and oversized sweaters. “The fabric almost feels like a blanket,” says our tester. “It's so soft, cozy, and thicker than other leggings I’ve tried.” Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Legging is an ideal winter legging option. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Leggings are made from soft and warm fabric. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Leggings have a winter-proof design for warmth. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Legging is high-waisted for comfort. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Legging has a versatile midi length. Credit: Shape

Beyond Yoga Spacedye At Your Leisure High Waisted Midi Legging comes in four different colors. Credit: Shape













Best Leggings for Women for Hot Weather Nike Pro Women's Mid-Rise Cropped Mesh Panel Leggings Credit: Nike $50 at Amazon View on Zappos $45 $39 at Nike Why We Like It Breathable mesh panels for ventilation

Mid-rise waistband for comfort and support

Ideal for high-intensity workouts in hot weather

Lightweight and comfortable It's Worth Noting Crop length may not work for everyone

Our tester noted some slight pilling after washing Colors: 3 | Sizes: XXS-3X | Materials: Polyester, spandex | Hem Length: Unlisted These leggings are made to keep you cool and comfortable, even in the hottest weather. The breathable mesh panels provide ventilation, allowing air to flow where you need it most during high-intensity workouts. The mid-rise waistband offers just the right amount of support while allowing freedom of movement, making them ideal for everything from yoga to running. “These leggings handled sweat and moisture well, and any sweat did dry very quickly,” says our tester. “I also noticed no sweat marks on the actual leggings themselves. They had a great amount of stretch for certain movements, but I could still breathe and didn't feel restricted in any way.” Nike Pro Women's Mid-Rise Cropped Mesh Panel Leggings have a mid-rise waistband. Credit: Shape

Nike Pro Women's Mid-Rise Cropped Mesh Panel Leggings have breathable mesh ideal for hot weather. Credit: Shape

The breathable mesh panels in these leggings provide ventilation for comfort in hot weather. Credit: Shape

The lightweight design of these leggings make them ideal for hot weather workouts. Credit: Shape

Nike Pro Women's Mid-Rise Cropped Mesh Panel Leggings allow freedom of movement with support. Credit: Shape

Nike Pro Women's Mid-Rise Cropped Leggings are versatile enough for many kinds of workouts. Credit: Shape











Best Leggings for Women for Shaping Alo Yoga High-Waist Legging Credit: Alo $108 $100 at Amazon $134 at Aloyoga.com View on Lyst.com Why We Like It Airlift fabric for sculpting and lifting

High-waisted design for extra support

Comfortable and stylish It's Worth Noting High-waisted design may feel too tight for some

More expensive than other leggings

Limited sizing Colors: 19 | Sizes: XXS-L | Materials: Polyester, elastane | Hem Length: 24.25”, 24.75” When it comes to security and aesthetics, Alo Yoga excels as a brand. These sleek high-waisted leggings are form-fitting without being too restricting. The Airlift sculpts and lifts your rear and tummy, giving you a smooth, contoured look, while the full stretch ensures comfort throughout the day. “These leggings fit perfectly, and I liked that the calves were tight but not too tight at the ankle,” notes our tester. “They really conformed to the leg nicely. They are true to size and the waistband never budged or moved. They really fit well and the material moved well with the body.” These leggings have a high-waisted design and provide additional support with a sculpted look. Credit: Shape

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging has a waistband that provides support and doesn't move. Credit: Shape

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging comforms to the legs without being too tight. Credit: Shape

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging provides a comfortable fit with a stylish look. Credit: Shape

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging has a high-waisted design that provides extra support. Credit: Shape

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging comes in 19 colors and ranges from XXS to L. Credit: Shape

Alo Yoga 7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging is made from Airlift fabric for a sculpted look and feel. Credit: Shape













Best Leggings for Women for Work Splits59 Dual High Waist Airweight Legging Credit: Splits59 $108 at Amazon View on Shopbop.com Why We Like It Super soft

Has a high-waisted design

Breathable It's Worth Noting Not as durable as thicker fabrics Colors: 3 | Sizes: XS-XL | Materials: Nylon, spandex | Hem Length: 26’’ For a chic yet professional look that can take you from desk to dinner, the Splits59 Dual High Waist Airweight 7/8 leggings are the perfect fit. These fashion-forward leggings offer a tailored, streamlined silhouette, with a high waist that ensures a smooth, flattering shape. The breathable Airweight fabric keeps you comfortable, while the 7/8 length is ideal for pairing with both flats and heels. Whether you're running from meetings or catching up with colleagues after hours, these leggings look just as stylish as they feel. “I would recommend this product to anyone who wears their leggings from yoga class to work,” says our tester. “These are definitely well-made enough to pass as pants or athleisure.” Splits59 Dual High Waist Airweight 7/8 Legging is made from breathable fabric for the perfect fit. Credit: Shape

title: 17 Best Leggings for Women in 2025, Tested and Reviewed

meta_data.description: From high-performance to low-impact leggings, we found the absolute best leggings for women for every activity level. Read about the most comfortable, flattering, and sweat-proof leggings, according to real tests and expert opinion.
meta_data.sailthru.author: Daisy Maldonado
meta_data.parsely-tags: Apparel and Gear,Workout Clothes,Shape,Workout Leggings and Bottoms,Product Reviews,What to Buy,affiliate
